text: "The Power" is the fourth single from Australian recording artist Vanessa Amorosi's debut album The Power. In Australia, the single was released as a double A side with "Every Time I Close My Eyes". The single became Amorosi's third consecutive top ten single. ==Track listing== {| class="wikitable" ! # !! width="" | "The Power"/ "Every Time I Close My Eyes" (Australia) !! | Time |- | 1. || "The Power" (Single version) || 3:27 |- | 2. || "Every Time I Close My Eyes" (Single version) || 4:06 |- | 3. || "The Power" (Album version) || 3:35 |- | 4. || "The Power" (Spiced Mix) || 3:38 |- | 5. || "Absolutely Everyboy" (UK Club Video Clip) || |} ==Charts== ===Weekly chart=== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2000/01) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- !scope="row" |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2001) ! scope="col"| Position |- ! scope="row"| Australia (ARIA) | 87 |} ==Certifications== ==Release history== {|class="wikitable" !
